languages.text: {n}На мгновение свет из-под повязок мигает странным оттенком, а хормейстер хватается за висок. На его лице возникает выражение... известное вам. Оно возникает у всех, кто сталкивается с {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}мрачными знаками{/d}, оставленными на вашей душе злом.{/n}

{n}The light emanating from beneath the bandages flickers with strange hues as the Choirmaster clutches his temple. His expression shifts in a way you are well familiar with. It is the look of one who has glimpsed the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}grim signs{/d} that evil has left upon your soul.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}На мгновение свет из-под повязок мигает странным оттенком, а хормейстер хватается за висок. На его лице возникает выражение... известное вам. Оно возникает у всех, кто сталкивается с {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}мрачными знаками{/d}, оставленными на вашей душе злом.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Das Licht unter den Bandagen flackert in seltsamen Farbtönen, als sich der Chormeister an die Schläfe fasst. Sein Gesichtsausdruck verändert sich auf eine Weise, die dir wohlbekannt ist. Es ist der Gesichtsausdruck eines Mannes, der die {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}düsteren Zeichen{/d} kennt, die das Böse auf deiner Seele hinterlassen hat.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The light emanating from beneath the bandages flickers with strange hues as the Choirmaster clutches his temple. His expression shifts in a way you are well familiar with. It is the look of one who has glimpsed the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}grim signs{/d} that evil has left upon your soul.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Das Licht unter den Bandagen flackert in seltsamen Farbtönen, als sich der Chormeister an die Schläfe fasst. Sein Gesichtsausdruck verändert sich auf eine Weise, die dir wohlbekannt ist. Es ist der Gesichtsausdruck eines Mannes, der die {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}düsteren Zeichen{/d} kennt, die das Böse auf deiner Seele hinterlassen hat.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La lumière émanant de ses bandages clignote et se pare de lueurs étranges alors que le maître de chœur se prend la tête à deux mains. La façon dont son expression change vous rappelle des souvenirs. C'est celle d'un homme qui a perçu les {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}signes funestes{/d} que le mal a laissés sur votre âme.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The light emanating from beneath the bandages flickers with strange hues as the Choirmaster clutches his temple. His expression shifts in a way you are well familiar with. It is the look of one who has glimpsed the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}grim signs{/d} that evil has left upon your soul.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La lumière émanant de ses bandages clignote et se pare de lueurs étranges alors que le maître de chœur se prend la tête à deux mains. La façon dont son expression change vous rappelle des souvenirs. C'est celle d'un homme qui a perçu les {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}signes funestes{/d} que le mal a laissés sur votre âme.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La luz que emana desde debajo de las vendas titila con tonos extraños y el maestro del coro se sujeta la sien. Su expresión cambia en una forma que conoces bien. Es la mirada de quien ha vislumbrado los {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}signos aciagos{/d} que la maldad ha dejado en tu alma.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The light emanating from beneath the bandages flickers with strange hues as the Choirmaster clutches his temple. His expression shifts in a way you are well familiar with. It is the look of one who has glimpsed the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}grim signs{/d} that evil has left upon your soul.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La luz que emana desde debajo de las vendas titila con tonos extraños y el maestro del coro se sujeta la sien. Su expresión cambia en una forma que conoces bien. Es la mirada de quien ha vislumbrado los {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}signos aciagos{/d} que la maldad ha dejado en tu alma.{/n}

languages.text: {n}クワイアーマスターがこめかみを抑える中、奇妙な色合いで明滅する光が包帯の下から発せられている。その表情が、あなたのよく知っているものへと変化する。それは邪悪があなたの魂に残した{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}深刻な痕跡{/d}を垣間見た者の表情だ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The light emanating from beneath the bandages flickers with strange hues as the Choirmaster clutches his temple. His expression shifts in a way you are well familiar with. It is the look of one who has glimpsed the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}grim signs{/d} that evil has left upon your soul.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}クワイアーマスターがこめかみを抑える中、奇妙な色合いで明滅する光が包帯の下から発せられている。その表情が、あなたのよく知っているものへと変化する。それは邪悪があなたの魂に残した{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}深刻な痕跡{/d}を垣間見た者の表情だ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}唱诗大师紧紧捂住了太阳穴，绷带下面发出的光线闪烁着诡异的色彩。他脸上的表情骤变，而你对这样的变化很熟悉。每当有人瞥见邪恶的力量在你的灵魂上留下的{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}可怕印记{/d}时，都会流露出这样的表情。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The light emanating from beneath the bandages flickers with strange hues as the Choirmaster clutches his temple. His expression shifts in a way you are well familiar with. It is the look of one who has glimpsed the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}grim signs{/d} that evil has left upon your soul.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}唱诗大师紧紧捂住了太阳穴，绷带下面发出的光线闪烁着诡异的色彩。他脸上的表情骤变，而你对这样的变化很熟悉。每当有人瞥见邪恶的力量在你的灵魂上留下的{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}可怕印记{/d}时，都会流露出这样的表情。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Sargıların altından yayılan ışık, Koro Şefi'nin ellerini şakaklarına götürmesiyle birlikte tuhaf renk tonlarında titreşiyor. İfadesi, bir hayli aşina olduğun bir şekilde değişiyor. Gördüğün ifade, kötülüğün ruhunda bıraktığı {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}gaddar izlere{/d} göz atan birine ait.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The light emanating from beneath the bandages flickers with strange hues as the Choirmaster clutches his temple. His expression shifts in a way you are well familiar with. It is the look of one who has glimpsed the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}grim signs{/d} that evil has left upon your soul.{/n}
